name: Employee of the month (itch) (Yrgo_Game_Creator)
description:
A 2D top down game where you get the chance to take out
all your office aggression against your friends in a two- to
four person shooter office showdown to become the Employee
of the month!

With three weapon slots in your rifle with room for modifiers,
you get to choose between several different items to express
your game play strategies with your personal favorite
combinations. Using office supplies such as pencil sharpeners,
coffee pots and even microwaves, you can build hybrid
weapons or collect three of the same modifier to create the
ultimate gun experience tailored for your personal playstyle.
Challenge yourself to improve your skills in a nerve-racking
deathmatch with a tempo that sets off your adrenaline and reflexes.

Our goal is to create a work environment that's nothing like
anything you've ever experienced before.

We want you to feel connected to your fellow employees, to
understand the weight and importance of proper office supplies
as well as great work conditions.

We believe in a vision that sees everyone for who they are,
and takes care of their co-workers in a professional manner.








 We are a group of students from YRGO who have gathered   
 to create the best game creating experience possible under
 the course of 7 weeks.
ARTISTS

Jon Cho
Leo Rocque
